summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.3°C) and outside temperature (down 10.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 318 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 206 m) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 317.7m lower than yesterday, 205.6m lower than past week, 205.7m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 425m to a maximum of 1526m, averaging 635.3m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 841.0m and 841.0m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and light winds will prevail. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and it’s dark. Weather patterns to stay the same.
